mapper.select: SELECT VALUE AS CODE_CD, VALUE_KNM AS CODE_LNM FROM WAA_COMMON_CODE WHERE CODE_NAME= #{value} -- 'BIZ_TYPE' AND IS_DELETED = 'N' ORDER BY DISPLAY_ORDER

SELECT CODE_VAL AS CODE_CD, CODE_VAL_NM AS CODE_LNM FROM WDQ_COM_CODEVAL WHERE CODE_ID = #{value} -- 'ERR_TYPE_CD' AND ORGL_TYPE IN ('C','U') AND XPR_DTTM = DATE_FORMAT('99991231','%Y%m%d') ORDER BY DISP_ORDER
SELECT CODE_ID, CODE AS CODE_CD, CODE_NM AS CODE_LNM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID = #{value} AND USE_AT='Y'
SELECT PRJ_ID AS CODE_CD, PRJ_NM AS CODE_LNM FROM PMSPORJECT WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND ORGL_TYPE IN ('C', 'U') ORDER BY PRJ_NM
SELECT CL_CODE AS CODE_CD, CL_CODE_NM AS CODE_LNM FROM COMTCCMMNCLCODE -- WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' -- AND ORGL_TYPE IN ('C', 'U') ORDER BY CL_CODE_NM
SELECT CODE_ID AS CODE_CD, CODE_ID_NM AS CODE_LNM FROM COMTCCMMNCODE WHERE USE_AT = 'Y' -- AND ORGL_TYPE IN ('C', 'U') ORDER BY CODE_LNM

SELECT COMM_DCD_ID AS CODE_CD , COMM_DCD_NM AS CODE_LNM , COMM_DCD AS CODE_PNM , UPP_COMM_DCD_ID AS UPCODE_CD FROM WAA_COMM_DCD WHERE EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ORDER BY COMM_DCD_NM

SELECT SYS_AREA_ID AS CODE_CD , SYS_AREA_LNM AS CODE_LNM , SYS_AREA_PNM AS CODE_PNM FROM WAA_SYS_AREA WHERE 1=1 AND EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ORDER BY SYS_AREA_LNM
SELECT DMNG_ID AS CODE_CD , DMNG_LNM AS CODE_LNM , DMNG_PNM AS CODE_PNM , UPP_DMNG_ID AS UPCODE_CD FROM WAA_DMNG WHERE EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('99991231','%Y%m%d') ORDER BY DMNG_LNM
SELECT INFOTP_ID AS CODE_CD , INFOTP_LNM AS CODE_LNM , INFOTP_LNM AS CODE_PNM , INFOTP_LNM AS CODE_PNM FROM WAA_INFO_TYPE WHERE EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('99991231','%Y%m%d') ORDER BY INFOTP_LNM

SELECT DMNG_ID AS CODE_CD , DMNG_LNM AS CODE_LNM , DMNG_PNM AS CODE_PNM , UPP_DMNG_ID AS UPCODE_CD , '' AS DATA_TYPE , 0 AS DATA_LEN , 0 AS DATA_SCAL FROM WAA_DMNG WHERE EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('99991231','%Y%m%d') UNION ALL SELECT A.INFOTP_ID AS CODE_CD , B.INFOTP_LNM AS CODE_LNM , B.INFOTP_LNM AS CODE_PNM , A.DMNG_ID AS UPCODE_CD , B.DATA_TYPE , IFNULL(B.DATA_LEN,0) AS DATA_LEN , IFNULL(B.DATA_SCAL,0) AS DATA_SCAL FROM WAA_DMNG_INFOTP_MAP A INNER JOIN WAA_INFO_TYPE B ON B.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('99991231','%Y%m%d') AND B.INFOTP_ID = A.INFOTP_ID WHERE A.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('99991231','%Y%m%d') ORDER BY DATA_TYPE , DATA_LEN , DATA_SCAL

SELECT A.INFOTP_ID AS CODE_CD , B.INFOTP_LNM AS CODE_LNM , B.INFOTP_LNM AS CODE_PNM , A.DMNG_ID AS UPCODE_CD FROM WAA_DMNG_INFOTP_MAP A INNER JOIN WAA_INFO_TYPE B ON A.INFOTP_ID = B.INFOTP_ID AND B.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('99991231','%Y%m%d') WHERE A.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('99991231','%Y%m%d') ORDER BY CODE_LNM
SELECT USERG_ID AS CODE_CD , USERG_LNM AS CODE_LNM , USERG_PNM AS CODE_PNM FROM WAA_USERG WHERE 1=1 AND EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ORDER BY USERG_LNM
SELECT COMM_DCD_NM AS CODE_LNM , COMM_DCD AS CODE_CD FROM WAA_COMM_DCD WHERE COMM_DCD like 'BBS%' AND EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ORDER BY CODE_CD

SELECT A.USERG_ID AS CODE_CD , A.USERG_LNM AS CODE_LNM , A.USERG_PNM AS CODE_PNM FROM WAA_USERG A INNER JOIN WAA_USER B ON A.USERG_ID = B.USERG_ID WHERE 1=1 AND B.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ORDER BY A.USERG_LNM

SELECT A.COMM_DTL_CD AS CODE_CD ,A.COMM_DTL_CD_NM AS CODE_LNM ,A.COMM_DTL_CD_ID AS CODE_PNM ,C.COMM_DTL_CD AS UPCODE_CD FROM WAA_COMM_DTL_CD A INNER JOIN WAA_COMM_DCD B ON A.COMM_DCD_ID = B.COMM_DCD_ID AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND B.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('99991231','%Y%m%d') AND B.COMM_DCD IN ('DBMS_VERS_CD','DBMS_TYP_CD') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_COMM_DTL_CD C ON A.UPP_COMM_DTL_CD_ID = C.COMM_DTL_CD_ID AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND C.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('99991231','%Y%m%d') WHERE A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND A.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('99991231','%Y%m%d') ORDER BY A.UPP_COMM_DTL_CD_ID DESC, A.COMM_DTL_CD_ID
-- 결재 그룹 코드 리스트 SELECT APRG_ID AS CODE_CD , APRG_NM AS CODE_LNM FROM WAA_APRG WHERE EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ORDER BY CODE_LNM

SELECT DB_CONN_TRG_ID AS CODE_CD , DB_CONN_TRG_LNM AS CODE_LNM , DB_CONN_TRG_PNM AS CODE_PNM FROM WAA_DB_CONN_TRG WHERE EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ORDER BY CODE_LNM
SELECT ANA_DGR AS CODE_CD ,CONCAT( ANA_DGR , '차') AS CODE_LNM ,'' AS CODE_PNM FROM WAM_PRF_RESULT WHERE ANA_STR_DTM IS NOT NULL AND ANA_DGR IS NOT NULL GROUP BY ANA_DGR

SELECT ANA_DGR AS CODE_CD ,CONCAT(ANA_DGR ,'차') AS CODE_LNM ,'' AS CODE_PNM FROM WAM_PRF_RESULT WHERE ANA_STR_DTM IS NOT NULL AND ANA_DGR IS NOT NULL GROUP BY ANA_DGR UNION ALL SELECT IFNULL(MAX(ANA_DGR), 0)+1 AS CODE_CD ,CONCAT( IFNULL(MAX(ANA_DGR), 0)+1 , '차 (신규차수)') AS CODE_LNM ,'' AS CODE_PNM FROM WAM_PRF_RESULT WHERE ANA_STR_DTM IS NOT NULL AND ANA_DGR IS NOT NULL

SELECT ANA_DGR AS CODE_CD ,CONCAT(ANA_DGR,'차') AS CODE_LNM ,'' AS CODE_PNM FROM WAM_BR_RESULT WHERE ANA_STR_DTM IS NOT NULL AND ANA_DGR IS NOT NULL GROUP BY ANA_DGR UNION ALL SELECT IFNULL(MAX(ANA_DGR), 0)+1 AS CODE_CD ,CONCAT( IFNULL(MAX(ANA_DGR), 0)+1 , '차 (신규차수)') AS CODE_LNM ,'' AS CODE_PNM FROM WAM_BR_RESULT WHERE ANA_STR_DTM IS NOT NULL AND ANA_DGR IS NOT NULL

SELECT ANA_DGR AS CODE_CD ,CONCAT( ANA_DGR , '차') AS CODE_LNM , '' AS CODE_PNM FROM WAD_OTL_RESULT WHERE ANA_STR_DTM IS NOT NULL AND ANA_DGR IS NOT NULL GROUP BY ANA_DGR UNION ALL SELECT IFNULL(MAX(ANA_DGR), 0)+1 AS CODE_CD , CONCAT( IFNULL(MAX(ANA_DGR), 0)+1 , '차 (신규차수)') AS CODE_LNM , '' AS CODE_PNM FROM WAD_OTL_RESULT WHERE ANA_STR_DTM IS NOT NULL AND ANA_DGR IS NOT NULL

SELECT ANA_DGR AS CODE_CD ,CONCAT( ANA_DGR , '차' )AS CODE_LNM , '' AS CODE_PNM FROM WAD_UOD_RESULT WHERE ANA_STR_DTM IS NOT NULL AND ANA_DGR IS NOT NULL GROUP BY ANA_DGR UNION ALL SELECT IFNULL(MAX(ANA_DGR), 0)+1 AS CODE_CD , CONCAT( IFNULL(MAX(ANA_DGR), 0)+1 , '차 (신규차수)' ) AS CODE_LNM , '' AS CODE_PNM FROM WAD_UOD_RESULT WHERE ANA_STR_DTM IS NOT NULL AND ANA_DGR IS NOT NULL

SELECT ANA_DGR AS CODE_CD ,CONCAT( ANA_DGR ,'차' )AS CODE_LNM , '' AS CODE_PNM FROM WAD_MTC_DATA WHERE ANA_STR_DTM IS NOT NULL AND ANA_DGR IS NOT NULL GROUP BY ANA_DGR UNION ALL SELECT IFNULL(MAX(ANA_DGR), 0)+1 AS CODE_CD ,CONCAT( IFNULL(MAX(ANA_DGR), 0)+1 , '차 (신규차수)') AS CODE_LNM , '' AS CODE_PNM FROM WAD_MTC_DATA WHERE ANA_STR_DTM IS NOT NULL AND ANA_DGR IS NOT NULL

SELECT DBMS_DATA_TYPE_ID AS CODE_CD ,DATA_TYPE_NM AS CODE_LNM ,'' AS CODE_PNM ,DBMS_TYP_CD AS UPCODE_CD FROM WAA_DBMS_DATA_TYPE WHERE EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ORDER BY UPCODE_CD, CODE_LNM

SELECT DBMS_DATA_TYPE_ID AS CODE_CD ,DATA_TYPE_NM AS CODE_LNM ,'' AS CODE_PNM ,DBMS_TYP_CD AS UPCODE_CD FROM WAA_DBMS_DATA_TYPE WHERE EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') UNION ALL SELECT A.COMM_DTL_CD AS CODE_CD ,A.COMM_DTL_CD_NM AS CODE_LNM ,A.COMM_DTL_CD_ID AS CODE_PNM ,'' AS UPCODE_CD FROM WAA_COMM_DTL_CD A INNER JOIN WAA_COMM_DCD B ON A.COMM_DCD_ID = B.COMM_DCD_ID AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND B.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('99991231','%Y%m%d') AND B.COMM_DCD IN ('DBMS_TYP_CD') ORDER BY UPCODE_CD, CODE_LNM

SELECT A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AS CODE_CD ,B.DB_CONN_TRG_LNM AS CODE_LNM ,A.DB_SCH_PNM AS CODE_PNM FROM WAA_DB_SCH A INNER JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG B ON A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = B.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND A.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT( '99991231', '%Y%m%d') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND B.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT( '99991231', '%Y%m%d') AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE A.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT( '99991231', '%Y%m%d') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') group by A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID ORDER BY B.DB_CONN_TRG_LNM, A.DB_SCH_LNM

SELECT A.DB_SCH_ID AS CODE_CD , CONCAT( B.DB_CONN_TRG_LNM , '.' , A.DB_SCH_LNM ) AS CODE_LNM , CONCAT( B.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM , '.' , A.DB_SCH_PNM ) AS CODE_PNM FROM WAA_DB_SCH A INNER JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG B ON B.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND B.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID WHERE A.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND A.DDL_TRG_DCD = 'D' ORDER BY B.DB_CONN_TRG_LNM , A.DB_SCH_LNM

SELECT A.SUBJ_ID AS CODE_CD , A.FULL_PATH AS CODE_LNM , A.SUBJ_PNM AS CODE_PNM , A.UPP_SUBJ_ID AS UPCODE_CD FROM WAA_SUBJ A LEFT JOIN WAA_SUBJ A2 ON A.UPP_SUBJ_ID = A2.SUBJ_ID WHERE A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND A.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY CODE_LNM IS NULL ,CODE_LNM
-- 임시 수정

SELECT A.SUBJ_ID AS CODE_CD , A.FULL_PATH AS CODE_LNM , A.SUBJ_PNM AS CODE_PNM , A.UPP_SUBJ_ID AS UPCODE_CD FROM WAA_SUBJ A WHERE A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND A.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND A.SUBJ_LVL = 1 ORDER BY CODE_LNM

SELECT A.DB_SCH_PNM AS CODE_CD ,A.DB_SCH_LNM AS CODE_LNM ,A.DB_SCH_PNM AS CODE_PNM ,B.DB_CONN_TRG_LNM AS UPCODE_CD FROM WAA_DB_SCH A INNER JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG B ON A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = B.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND A.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND B.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE A.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') UNION ALL SELECT A.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM AS CODE_CD ,A.DB_CONN_TRG_LNM AS CODE_LNM ,A.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM AS CODE_PNM ,'' AS UPCODE_CD FROM WAA_DB_CONN_TRG A WHERE A.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ORDER BY UPCODE_CD, CODE_LNM

SELECT A.DB_SCH_ID AS CODE_CD , A.DB_SCH_LNM AS CODE_LNM , A.DB_SCH_PNM AS CODE_PNM , B.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AS UPCODE_CD FROM WAA_DB_SCH A INNER JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG B ON B.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND B.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE A.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND IFNULL(A.CLT_XCL_YN,'N') = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AS CODE_CD , A.DB_CONN_TRG_LNM AS CODE_LNM , A.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM AS CODE_PNM , '' AS UPCODE_CD FROM WAA_DB_CONN_TRG A WHERE A.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ORDER BY UPCODE_CD, CODE_LNM

SELECT A.DB_SCH_ID AS CODE_CD , A.DB_SCH_LNM AS CODE_LNM , A.DB_SCH_PNM AS CODE_PNM , B.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AS UPCODE_CD FROM WAA_DB_SCH A INNER JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG B ON A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = B.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND A.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND B.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE A.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') UNION ALL SELECT A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AS CODE_CD , A.DB_CONN_TRG_LNM AS CODE_LNM , A.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM AS CODE_PNM , '' AS UPCODE_CD FROM WAA_DB_CONN_TRG A WHERE A.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ORDER BY UPCODE_CD, CODE_LNM

SELECT A.DB_SCH_ID AS CODE_CD , A.DB_SCH_LNM AS CODE_LNM , A.DB_SCH_PNM AS CODE_PNM , B.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AS UPCODE_CD FROM WAA_DB_SCH A INNER JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG B ON A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = B.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND A.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND B.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND B.META_MNG_YN ='Y' AND A.DDL_TRG_YN ='Y' AND A.DDL_TRG_DCD !='D' AND A.CD_SND_TRG_YN ='Y' WHERE A.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') UNION ALL SELECT A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AS CODE_CD , A.DB_CONN_TRG_LNM AS CODE_LNM , A.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM AS CODE_PNM , '' AS UPCODE_CD FROM WAA_DB_CONN_TRG A WHERE A.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND A.META_MNG_YN ='Y' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAA_DB_SCH B WHERE A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = B.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND B.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND B.DDL_TRG_YN ='Y' AND B.DDL_TRG_DCD !='D' AND B.CD_SND_TRG_YN ='Y' AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ) ORDER BY UPCODE_CD, CODE_LNM

SELECT A.DB_SCH_ID AS CODE_CD , A.DB_SCH_LNM AS CODE_LNM , A.DB_SCH_PNM AS CODE_PNM , B.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AS UPCODE_CD FROM WAA_DB_MAP M INNER JOIN WAA_DB_SCH A ON M.SRC_DB_SCH_ID = A.DB_SCH_ID AND A.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG B ON A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = B.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND B.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE M.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND M.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') UNION ALL SELECT B.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AS CODE_CD , B.DB_CONN_TRG_LNM AS CODE_LNM , B.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM AS CODE_PNM , '' AS UPCODE_CD FROM WAA_DB_MAP M INNER JOIN WAA_DB_SCH A ON M.SRC_DB_SCH_ID = A.DB_SCH_ID AND A.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG B ON A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = B.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND B.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE M.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND M.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ORDER BY UPCODE_CD, CODE_LNM

SELECT A.DB_SCH_ID AS CODE_CD , A.DB_SCH_LNM AS CODE_LNM , A.DB_SCH_PNM AS CODE_PNM , B.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AS UPCODE_CD FROM WAA_DB_MAP M INNER JOIN WAA_DB_SCH A ON M.TGT_DB_SCH_ID = A.DB_SCH_ID AND A.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG B ON A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = B.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND B.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE M.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND M.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') UNION ALL SELECT B.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AS CODE_CD , B.DB_CONN_TRG_LNM AS CODE_LNM , B.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM AS CODE_PNM , '' AS UPCODE_CD FROM WAA_DB_MAP M INNER JOIN WAA_DB_SCH A ON M.TGT_DB_SCH_ID = A.DB_SCH_ID AND A.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG B ON A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = B.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND B.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE M.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND M.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ORDER BY UPCODE_CD, CODE_LNM
SELECT LNG_CD AS CODE_CD , LNG_NM AS CODE_LNM FROM WAT_PGM_ASTA_LNG ORDER BY LNG_NM

SELECT DMNG_ID AS CODE_CD ,DMNG_LNM AS CODE_LNM ,DMNG_PNM AS CODE_PNM FROM WAA_DMNG WHERE 1=1 AND EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND DMNG_LVL = (SELECT BSC_LVL-1 FROM WAA_BSC_LVL WHERE BSC_ID = 'DMNG' AND EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U'))

SELECT SUBJ_ID AS CODE_CD , FULL_PATH AS CODE_LNM , SUBJ_PNM AS CODE_PNM , NULL AS UPCODE_CD FROM WAA_SUBJ WHERE EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('99991231','%Y%m%d') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND SUBJ_LVL = (SELECT BSC_LVL-1 FROM WAA_BSC_LVL WHERE BSC_ID = 'SUBJ' AND EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')) UNION ALL SELECT A.PDM_TBL_ID AS CODE_CD , A.PDM_TBL_PNM AS CODE_LNM , A.PDM_TBL_LNM AS CODE_PNM , A.SUBJ_ID AS UPCODE_CD FROM WAM_PDM_TBL A INNER JOIN WAA_SUBJ B ON A.SUBJ_ID = B.SUBJ_ID AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND B.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('99991231','%Y%m%d')
WHERE A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ORDER BY CODE_LNM

SELECT DB_SCH_ID AS CODE_CD , DB_SCH_LNM AS CODE_LNM , DB_SCH_PNM AS CODE_PNM , DB_CONN_TRG_ID AS UPCODE_CD FROM WAA_DB_SCH WHERE EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ORDER BY UPCODE_CD, CODE_LNM

SELECT DISTINCT DB.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AS CODE_CD , DB.DB_CONN_TRG_LNM AS CODE_LNM , DB.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM AS CODE_PNM FROM WAA_DB_ROLE A INNER JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG DB ON A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = DB.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND DB.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND DB.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') WHERE A.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ORDER BY CODE_LNM

SELECT ROLE_ID AS CODE_CD , ROLE_PNM AS CODE_LNM , ROLE_LNM AS CODE_PNM , DB_CONN_TRG_ID AS UPCODE_CD FROM WAA_DB_ROLE WHERE EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ORDER BY UPCODE_CD, CODE_LNM

SELECT ROLE_ID AS CODE_CD , ROLE_PNM AS CODE_LNM , ROLE_LNM AS CODE_PNM , DB_CONN_TRG_ID AS UPCODE_CD FROM WAA_DB_ROLE WHERE REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') UNION ALL SELECT DB_CONN_TRG_ID AS CODE_CD , DB_CONN_TRG_LNM AS CODE_LNM , DB_CONN_TRG_PNM AS CODE_PNM , '' AS UPCODE_CD FROM WAA_DB_CONN_TRG WHERE REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT DB_SCH_ID AS CODE_CD , DB_SCH_LNM AS CODE_LNM , DB_SCH_PNM AS CODE_PNM
FROM WAA_DB_SCH WHERE REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT A.CD_VAL AS CODE_CD ,A.CD_VAL_NM AS CODE_LNM FROM WAM_CD_VAL A INNER JOIN WAM_DMN B ON A.DMN_ID = B.DMN_ID AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE B.DMN_PNM = 'CL_SYSTM_TY_CODE' AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')

SELECT A.CD_VAL AS CODE_CD ,A.CD_VAL_NM AS CODE_LNM FROM WAM_CD_VAL A INNER JOIN WAM_DMN B ON A.DMN_ID = B.DMN_ID AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE B.DMN_PNM = 'CL_SYSTM_TY_IEM_CODE' AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')

SELECT 'TBL' AS CODE_CD , '테이블' AS CODE_LNM , NULL AS CODE_PNM , NULL AS UPCODE_CD FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'IDX' AS CODE_CD , '인덱스' AS CODE_LNM , NULL AS CODE_PNM , NULL AS UPCODE_CD FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT DB_TBL_SPAC_PNM AS CODE_CD , IFNULL(DB_TBL_SPAC_LNM,DB_TBL_SPAC_PNM) AS CODE_LNM , DB_TBL_SPAC_PNM AS CODE_PNM , 'TBL' AS UPCODE_CD FROM WAA_TBL_SPAC WHERE REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND TBL_SPAC_TYP_CD = 'T' UNION ALL SELECT DB_TBL_SPAC_PNM AS CODE_CD , IFNULL(DB_TBL_SPAC_LNM,DB_TBL_SPAC_PNM) AS CODE_LNM , DB_TBL_SPAC_PNM AS CODE_PNM , 'IDX' AS UPCODE_CD FROM WAA_TBL_SPAC WHERE REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND TBL_SPAC_TYP_CD = 'I'

SELECT DB_TBL_SPAC_ID AS CODE_CD , IFNULL(DB_TBL_SPAC_LNM,DB_TBL_SPAC_PNM) AS CODE_LNM , DB_TBL_SPAC_PNM AS CODE_PNM , NULL AS UPCODE_CD FROM WAA_TBL_SPAC WHERE REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND TBL_SPAC_TYP_CD = 'T'

SELECT DB_TBL_SPAC_ID AS CODE_CD , IFNULL(DB_TBL_SPAC_LNM,DB_TBL_SPAC_PNM) AS CODE_LNM , DB_TBL_SPAC_PNM AS CODE_PNM , NULL AS UPCODE_CD FROM WAA_TBL_SPAC WHERE REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND TBL_SPAC_TYP_CD = 'I'

SELECT DMNG_ID AS CODE_CD , DMNG_LNM AS CODE_LNM , DMNG_PNM AS CODE_PNM , UPP_DMNG_ID AS UPCODE_CD FROM WAA_DMNG WHERE EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('99991231','%Y%m%d') AND CD_DMN_YN ='Y' UNION ALL SELECT A.INFOTP_ID AS CODE_CD , B.INFOTP_LNM AS CODE_LNM , B.INFOTP_LNM AS CODE_PNM , A.DMNG_ID AS UPCODE_CD FROM WAA_DMNG_INFOTP_MAP A INNER JOIN WAA_INFO_TYPE B ON A.INFOTP_ID = B.INFOTP_ID AND B.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('99991231','%Y%m%d') WHERE A.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('99991231','%Y%m%d') AND A.DMNG_ID IN (SELECT DMNG_ID FROM WAA_DMNG WHERE EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('99991231','%Y%m%d') AND CD_DMN_YN ='Y') ORDER BY CODE_LNM

SELECT A.DB_SCH_ID AS CODE_CD , A.DB_SCH_LNM AS CODE_LNM , A.DB_SCH_PNM AS CODE_PNM , B.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AS UPCODE_CD FROM WAA_DB_SCH A INNER JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG B ON B.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND B.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE A.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND A.DDL_TRG_DCD = 'D' UNION ALL SELECT A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AS CODE_CD , A.DB_CONN_TRG_LNM AS CODE_LNM , A.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM AS CODE_PNM , '' AS UPCODE_CD FROM WAA_DB_CONN_TRG A WHERE A.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID IN (SELECT DB_CONN_TRG_ID FROM WAA_DB_SCH X WHERE X.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND X.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND X.DDL_TRG_DCD = 'D' ) ORDER BY UPCODE_CD, CODE_LNM

SELECT A.DB_SCH_ID AS CODE_CD , A.DB_SCH_LNM AS CODE_LNM , A.DB_SCH_PNM AS CODE_PNM , B.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AS UPCODE_CD FROM WAA_DB_SCH A INNER JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG B ON B.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND B.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND B.META_MNG_YN ='Y' WHERE A.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') UNION ALL SELECT A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AS CODE_CD , A.DB_CONN_TRG_LNM AS CODE_LNM , A.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM AS CODE_PNM , '' AS UPCODE_CD FROM WAA_DB_CONN_TRG A WHERE A.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID IN (SELECT A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID FROM WAA_DB_SCH A WHERE A.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') ) ORDER BY UPCODE_CD, CODE_LNM
-- 이상값 탐지 알고리즘 코드 조회... SELECT ALG_ID AS CODE_CD , ALG_LNM AS CODE_LNM , ALG_PNM AS CODE_PNM FROM WAA_ALG WHERE ALG_TYP_CD = 'OD' AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ORDER BY ALG_ID

-- 이상값 처리 코드 조회... SELECT A.COMM_DTL_CD AS CODE_CD ,A.COMM_DTL_CD_NM AS CODE_LNM ,A.COMM_DTL_CD_ID AS CODE_PNM ,'' AS UPCODE_CD FROM WAA_COMM_DTL_CD A INNER JOIN WAA_COMM_DCD B ON A.COMM_DCD_ID = B.COMM_DCD_ID AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND B.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('99991231','%Y%m%d') AND B.COMM_DCD IN ('OTL_TYP_CD') ORDER BY CODE_CD

-- 이상값 화면 품질지표 조회... SELECT A.DQI_ID AS CODE_CD , A.DQI_LNM AS CODE_LNM , A.UPP_DQI_ID FROM WAM_DQI A WHERE REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT B.UPP_DQI_ID FROM WAM_DQI B WHERE B.UPP_DQI_ID = A.DQI_ID) ORDER BY A.UPP_DQI_ID, A.DQI_ID

SELECT A.DB_SCH_ID AS CODE_CD , A.DB_SCH_LNM AS CODE_LNM , A.DB_SCH_PNM AS CODE_PNM , B.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AS UPCODE_CD FROM WAA_DB_SCH A INNER JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG B ON B.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = A.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND B.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE A.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND IFNULL(A.CLT_XCL_YN,'N') = 'N' ORDER BY UPCODE_CD, CODE_LNM

SELECT A.VRFC_ID AS CODE_CD , A.VRFC_NM AS CODE_LNM , A.VRFC_NM AS CODE_PNM , '' AS UPCODE_CD FROM WAA_VRFC_RULE A
AND A.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT( '9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
ORDER BY A.VRFC_TYP , A.VRFC_NM , A.VRFC_ID
